article_title: In Era Of Obamacare, Hospitals Increase Links To Walgreen, CVS

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: Hospitals and health systems are negotiating more clinical deals with retailers like CVS/Caremark (CVS) and Walgreen (WAG) as traditional providers of medical care work to capture more health care dollars from newly insured Americans under the Affordable Care Act. Increasingly, the giant drugstore chains, Wal-Mart (WMT) and even some grocers like Kroger [...]
